actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: Resolution to express the sense of the House of Representatives that the President of the United States should direct the Secretary of the Interior to conserve the helium which is now being extracted from natural gas and then wasted into the atmosphere.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the House of Representatives that the President of the United States should direct the Secretary of the Interior to make prompt arrangements to conserve the helium which is now being extracted and then vented into the atmosphere.

titles.title: Resolution to express the sense of the House of Representatives that the President of the United States should direct the Secretary of the Interior to conserve the helium which is now being extracted from natural gas and then wasted into the atmosphere.
